commits.message: feat: add auto-commit plan for project initialization
commits.description: Introduces `auto_commit_plan.json` to define the structured sequence of commits for the initial project setup. This plan serves as a guide for the auto-commit system.
Integrates `eslint-config-prettier` to ensure compatibility between ESLint and Prettier. Updates React version detection to 'detect' for improved flexibility.

commits.message: build: refactor Vite path resolution for ESM
commits.description: Updates Vite configuration to use `fileURLToPath` and `URL` for alias resolution, aligning with modern ESM practices and Node.js environments.
Changes `any[]` to `unknown[]` for `rows` and `fields` in the `QueryResult` interface, enforcing stricter type checking and safer data handling.
